name: AI learns to play Pong
description: This was a personal project of mine, I was learning about neural networks, this is one of the things that came out of it. You can't do anything, just watch the two neural networks learn to play Pong. I learned how to do this from a udemy course by Penny de Byl. You can find the link here https://www.udemy.com/machine-learning-with-unity/. I would recommend having experience with unity, although it's not necessary. You can learn more about neural networks here. This guy explains the concepts and not much of the code so if that is more your cup of tea then go for it:
